2. Mexico: This is the second organization mentioned in the paragraph. It is a country in North America and is the other party involved in the negotiations to broaden the free trade agreement.
3. Finance Minister Eduardo Aninat: Although this is not an organization, it is a government official from Chile who is mentioned in the paragraph. As a representative of the Chilean government, he can be considered as part of the organization of Chile.

Therefore, the "Organization" entities in the paragraph are Chile, Mexico, and Finance Minister Eduardo Aninat (as a representative of the Chilean government).

2. Mexico: This is also a clear organization, as it is a sovereign state in North America.
